Main Log-file

Document version: 1.0

Author(s): Sven Gijsen

Date: July 2015

Introduction

There's a main Log-file that BrainStim uses to output all kind of application information (events, information, warnings, exceptions, errors) to. This file is stored in the Main User directory under the name logfile.txt. Application information is automatically appended to this file where each line is prepended with a timestamp of when the application information was stored. This document can be important for analyzing and debugging the program flow and therefore should always be consulted in case something unusual happened.
